name: Quinoa
properties: Part of Daily Dozen whole grains
benefits: Quinoa is a whole grain with low glycemic load and provides complete protein. As an intact grain, it keeps calories trapped within cell walls, which activates the ileal brake that dials down appetite.
amount: Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of whole grains daily

quotes: Eating whole grains is good, but eating whole-grain kernels is better.
